spiritsExplanation:
The primary spirit of this workout is "Structured & Disciplined," as evidenced by the focus on strength training with specific audio cues, which suggests a methodical and precise approach to exercise. The description emphasizes mastering each movement with correct form and suggests challenging oneself with multiple sets of weights, aligning with disciplined training. Tags such as "dumbbell strength training" and "full body strength training" further support this spirit. The high score of 0.9 reflects the strong presence of structured elements.

Secondly, "High-Energy & Intense" is represented to a moderate degree. The workout involves a full body regimen with an encouragement to test one's limits by using heavier weights, which introduces an aspect of intensity, although it is made accessible for all fitness levels. Titles like "burn fat workout" suggest a dynamic component, leading to a moderate score of 0.6 for this spirit.

Other spirits, such as "Flow & Rhythm" or "Soothing & Restorative," were ruled out due to the lack of emphasis on mind-body connectivity or relaxation in both metadata and user comments.
